name: tm74
effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
